metadata.feature_description: Create, edit, and manage blog posts with rich content, metadata, and media attachments

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create new post with title and body

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.expected: Publisher module is visible with Create Post link
steps.actual: Publisher module found with 'Create Post' link visible

steps.action: Click Create Post link to open new post form
steps.expected: New post creation form appears with title and body fields
steps.actual: Create post form loaded with title input and rich text editor for body

steps.action: Enter title 'Test Post for Publisher Feature Testing' and body content
steps.expected: Title and body content are entered in the form
steps.actual: Title entered via keyboard input, body content added

steps.action: Click Submit/Publish button to create the post
steps.expected: Post is created and user is redirected to the post view
steps.actual: Post created successfully, redirected to post view with 'awaiting moderation' message

steps.action: Attempt to publish post without entering body content
steps.expected: Validation error message appears indicating body is required
steps.actual: Validation error displayed: 'The text of the story is required'

steps.action: Create post with title 'Test Post for Publisher Feature'
steps.expected: URL slug is automatically generated from the title
steps.actual: Slug automatically generated as 'Test-Post-for-Publisher-Feature' in URL

steps.action: Click Edit Post link on existing post
steps.expected: Edit form opens with existing content loaded
steps.actual: Edit form loaded with title and body pre-populated

steps.action: Modify title to 'Edited Post Title - Testing Edit Feature'
steps.expected: Title field accepts the new value
steps.actual: Title successfully changed in the edit form

steps.expected: Changes are saved and confirmation message appears
Post view shows the new title
steps.actual: Post heading displays 'Edited Post Title - Testing Edit Feature'

steps.action: Open edit form and click on Stored Location tab for image
steps.expected: Image picker shows available images from file manager
steps.actual: Image picker displayed with list of available images including test-image, cavalier-tv, etc.

steps.action: Select an image and click Insert Image
steps.expected: Selected image is inserted as main post image
steps.actual: Cavalier banner image inserted as main image with Edit/Delete options

steps.expected: Post saves successfully with the main image
steps.actual: Post Saved Successfully message displayed, image visible in post view

steps.expected: Metadata panel shows Title, Description, URL, Featured checkbox, and Tags fields
steps.actual: Edit Post Details panel displayed with all metadata fields visible

steps.action: Add tags: test, publisher, blog, feature
steps.expected: Tags are added and displayed as individual badges
steps.actual: Tags added successfully, displayed as removable badges

steps.action: Modify title field with unsaved changes
steps.actual: Title changed to 'Modified Title - Should Be Cancelled'
Discard dialog appeared with message field and Cancel/Discard buttons

steps.action: Enter discard message and confirm discard
steps.expected: Changes are discarded and post is removed (since unpublished)
steps.actual: Post Discarded Successfully message shown, post removed from system

observations: The Publisher module uses workflow states - posts await moderation before being fully published
Body content requires proper keyboard input via the rich text editor (Redactor) - direct DOM manipulation causes state issues
Discard functionality requires a message and removes unpublished posts completely
Tags are displayed as individual badges with remove buttons for easy management
URL/Slug is automatically generated from the post title using hyphen-separated words
